Description: Grab your bestie and let the pampering begin! First, enjoy some solo oooh-and-ahhh time in separate rooms as you melt into a dreamy warm candle massage. Then, reunite in our cozy relaxation area to sip, gossip, and mask up with a Pink Diamond Face Mask—because glowing skin is the ultimate friendship flex! And to make it official, take home matching plush spa headbands—because no spa day is complete without a little twinning!

Let the warmth of romance envelop you as you and your love sink into pure indulgence with a luxurious 90 minute couple’s hot stone massage. The soothing heat of expertly placed stones melts away every ounce of tension, while the soft glow and delicate aroma of our warm massage candle set the scene for deep relaxation and connection. Designed to awaken the senses and leave you both basking in bliss, this intimate experience is the perfect way to keep the love burning bright—long after the last touch fades.

Our ode to the iconic stiletto-loving city life, inspired by the glitz, glam, and unstoppable stride of urban chic. Created for those who brave countless knots and corns from their high-heeled adventures, this treatment combines a circulation-boosting foot massage with hot stones and a guava leaf foot wrap. And just like that, your soles will be ready to take on the world again—in style!

Among our oriental-inspired treatments, the Balinese Boreh stands out as the ultimate sensory indulgence, offering a deeply restorative full-body heat experience. Your journey begins with our signature BALIN-EASE massage, expertly designed to release tension and ease you into a state of deep tranquility. This is followed by a traditional Boreh wrap—a centuries-old Balinese blend of sandalwood, cloves, ginger, cinnamon, and ground rice, cherished for its warming and healing properties. The treatment is completed with a cooling carrot rub to polish the body. Together, these elements create a holistic experience that soothes the body, revitalizes the senses, and restores inner harmony.

This innovative facial provides an outstanding lifting effect and reveals incredibly supple and plump skin. It is a reparative treatment that will enhance cellular function to fight premature ageing caused by hormonal fluctuations.

Reverse the signs of premature ageing with this nutrient-rich facial that stimulates collagen, reduces inflammation, and intensely moisturises and firms the skin. Reawaken your senses and brighten your skin tone, unveiling a hydrated and revitalised complexion.

Purify · Hydrate · Revitalise Awaken your skin and restore a healthy glow with the fortifying energy of pure water and oxygen to decongest, brighten, and clarify. This exfoliating and invigorating treatment releases pure oxygen molecules into the skin, eliminating toxins and restoring its youthful tone and vitality. Perfect for any skin type, and especially beneficial for frequent travelers or anyone with dull or dehydrated skin.

Soothe · Balance · Calm This calming facial is the perfect answer for hypersensitive or irritated skin. Pamper your skin with a combination of gentle botanical ingredients that repairs and decongests whilst visibly soothing skin, providing maximum relief and comfort from red spots and inflammation.

An invigorating facial treatment that’s perfect for all skin types and anyone looking to quickly restore a glowing youthful appearance. It’s the perfect beauty booster before a special event or as an introduction to Natura Bisse facial treatments.
